title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 4.9 - Effect of temporary appointment on eligibility for permanent appointment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 4.9 - Effect of temporary appointment on eligibility for permanent appointment

State Regulations

The acceptance by an eligible of a temporary appointment
shall not affect his standing on the eligible list for a permanent appointment, nor shall the period of temporary service be counted as part of the
probationary service in the event of subsequent permanent
appointment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
4.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
